price: 50. Zij zeiden: “Geen punt? Waarlijk tot onze Heer zullen wij terugkeren;
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
